response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an investment in quality, innovation, and unparalleled performance. Given its exceptional features and the time, effort, and resources poured into its development, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering the benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is an exceptional value considering the market demand and the scarcity of such high-quality items. I look forward to discussing how this product could significantly enhance your experience and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Let's make this remarkable opportunity yours today.", "product_price": 18000}
